sentences.sContent: They expressed the hope that he would pursue a neutral and balanced policy for the sake of national concord.
sentences.sCn: 他们希望他能为国家的和谐而追求一种中立而平衡的政策。

remMethod.val: con(共同) + cord(心) → 心与心相连 → 和睦

words.tran: 和谐的；协调的；一致的；和声的
调和，一致；用语索引；著作或作家全集的重要用字索引

trans.tranOther: Concord is a state of peaceful agreement
